original_text: And Jehoiakim gave the silver and the gold to Pharaoh; but he taxed the land to give the money according to the commandment of Pharaoh: he exacted the silver and the gold of the people of the land, of every one according to his taxation, to give it unto Pharaohnechoh.
korean_text: 여호야김이 은과 금을 바로에게 주니라 그가 바로 느고의 명령대로 그에게 그 돈을 주기 위하여 나라에 부과하되 백성들 각 사람의 힘대로 액수를 정하고 은금을 징수하였더라

sentences.original_text: And Jehoiakim gave the silver and the gold to Pharaoh
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 여호야김이 은과 금을 바로에게 주었으니

sentences.original_text: but he taxed the land to give the money
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 그가 돈을 주기 위해 땅에 세금을 부과하였으니

sentences.original_text: according to the commandment of Pharaoh
he exacted the silver and the gold of the people of the land
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 땅 백성들에게서 은과 금을 거두었으니

sentences.original_text: of every one according to his taxation
